subject: Career
title: The Double Opt-In Introduction
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Double Opt-In Introduction.

hook.text: She wanted to connect two people. Instead of cc-ing both, she asked each first. Consent before connection.

buildup.text: The double opt-in: ask both parties if they want to be introduced before making the introduction.

discovery.text: This protects both people's time and ensures the connection is welcomed, not imposed.

twist.text: Skipping the opt-in signals you value your generosity more than their time. It burns goodwill.

climax.text: Message each person separately: explain why you think they should connect and ask permission.

punchline.text: Great connectors ask permission first. Not overhead â€” respect.

quiz.question: What is a double opt-in introduction?
options: Asking both parties for consent before connecting them
